questions.title: How to create a React component?
questions.content: I'm new to React and want to create a simple component. Can someone guide me?

answers.content: To create a React component, you need to use the `React.Component` class...

comments.content: Great explanation! Can you provide an example?
I'm having issues with state management. Any tips?

answers.content: Another approach is to use functional components with hooks...

questions.title: How to use useState in React?
questions.content: I've heard about the useState hook in React. How do I use it?

answers.content: In functional components, you can use the `useState` hook to manage state...

comments.content: Does `useState` work with class components too?
